colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RDO RJE SDER MO'I GZUNGS MDO DANG 'BREL ZHING LLYI DAM BSRUNG MA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAS PHYIR BZLOG BYED TSUL PHAS RGOL 'JOMS PA'I RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, HAL HA GA-YON RUS PHYOGS TA'I CHING DZA SAG MGON DKAR SKYABS KYI BLA MA MKHYEN PA'I DPYOD LDAN AA CHI THU CHIR BLO BZANG BRTZON BGRUS DANG, DPAL LDAN AUS DZING THAS JI 'CHI MED RNAM GNYIS KYIS BSKUL ZHING, LHAG PAR BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG MI RJE DAM PA AER TE NI AA HAS DZAA SAG RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE'I RIM 'GROR NYER 'KHO'I BSKUL MA BYUNG ZHING, 'DI 'DRA'I LAG LEN YOD MED MTHONG THOS SU MA GYUR CING, GDUGS DKAR GYI GZUNGS MDO SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL YIG RNYING DANG GSAR BRTZOM MANG DU BZHUGS PA DE BZHIN, 'DIR YANG DE'I RIG 'DRA'I SBYOR RUNG DAM SNYAMS 'ON KYANG GZUNGS MDO KHO NA LA BSTEN NAS BYAR RUNG MI RUNG THE TSOM MCHIS KYANG, RANG GI YI DAM CHOS SKYONGS GI 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAS GZUNGS MDO DANG BSSTUN PA'I RIG 'DRA'I SBYOR RUNG BAR SEMS SHING, MO BYA MKHAN GYI LUNG BRTAN DU 'KHRUL BA'I GDON GNYER CAN MANG DU CHIS KYANG LAG LEN RNAM DAG BYED MKHAN SU YANG MA MTHONG, 'JAM DPAL RDO RJE'I MDZAD PA CI KHA GA-YAR PA'I RDO RJE SDER MO'I BZLOG BSGYUR DU GRAGS PA DE NI MDOS GLUNG GYI NGAG GDON LAS BZLOG TSIG KHUNG MED SNA TSOGS SHIG BRIS 'DUG PA MDOS GTOR GYI RNAM DBYE MI SHES PA'I RANG BZHIN LAM MA 'DAM PAS, GZUNGS MDO RANG GI GZHUNG DON DANG, MTHUN CING DPYAD BZOD PA'I KHUL DU BYAS TE RANG BZHIN LA PHAN SEMS KYI KUN NAS SLANGS TE AA CHE THU AER TE NI MER GIN MKHAN PO'I CHOS RJE SNGAGS 'CHANG 'GE 'DUN SENGGE CES MING DON LA BRAL GYI NA BAS SDEBS PA'O,, ,,)
